definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: We study the unstable autoregressive process for the first order with infinite variance.
sentences.chinese: 對具有無限方差的一階自迴歸非平穩過程進行了研究。

sentences.english: Therefore it is necessary to test the variance homogeneity of the models.
sentences.chinese: 因此對迴歸模型的方差齊性檢驗是十分必要的。

sentences.english: It is well known that Allan variance is defined by no dead time two-sample variance.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，阿侖方差是按無間隙雙採樣定義的。

sentences.english: Different populations were sampled and made for statistics and nested analysis by SAS.
sentences.chinese: 按居羣取樣，用SAS軟件統計，並做巢式方差分析。

sentences.english: Measurement data were compared with analysis of variance.
sentences.chinese: 計量資料差異比較採用方差分析。

sentences.english: It not only avoids computing cross-covariance matrices but also improves local estimation accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 避免了計算互協方差陣，且能改善局部估計的精度。

sentences.english: The analysis of variance and t test were applied in comparing the intergroup difference of measurement data.
sentences.chinese: 組間計量資料差異性比較採用方差分析和t檢驗。

sentences.english: In longitudinal data analysis, homogeneity of variance is a basic assumption.
sentences.chinese: 在縱向數據分析中，模型方差的齊性是一個基本假定。

sentences.english: Measurement data were compared with single factor analysis of variance.
sentences.chinese: 計量資料差異比較採用單因素方差分析。

sentences.english: On the contrary, a risk is some condition that adds to project variance.
sentences.chinese: 反之，風險是向項目方差中加入的某個條件。

sentences.english: Analysis of variance was applied in the intergroup analysis.
sentences.chinese: 組間分析採用方差分析。

sentences.english: Compare among different phases of the same group by One-way ANOVA.
sentences.chinese: 同組各階段兩兩比較用單因素方差分析。

sentences.english: The mean was compared by analysis of variance.
sentences.chinese: 對樣本均數比較採用方差分析。

sentences.english: The estimation of noise covariance matrix is based on iterative procedure in ML.
sentences.chinese: 最大似然法採用了迭代的方法來估計噪聲的協方差矩。

sentences.english: ANOVA is an effective method used in mathematics statistics.
sentences.chinese: 方差分析是數理統計中常採用的一種方法。

sentences.english: Kalman filtering is the recursive version of ihe first estimate.
sentences.chinese: 卡爾曼濾波即是線性最小方差估計的遞推形式。

definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit

pinyin: zui4 da4 si4 ran2 gu1 ji4
